Description: We are hiring a Senior MEP Engineer for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 10 years of experience out of which at least 5 years of construction experience in the Middle East in well-reputed large MEP companies.
Proven track record in completing projects.
Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a relevant subject. Chartered through a relevant and appropriate institution.
UPDA/MMUP Grade A preferred.
Civil Defense Certification from Qatar Civil Defense.
Nationality: Arabic or European
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar

Preferred.Nationality: All Arab Countries; All Eastern European Countries
